meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Where the fun never stops!

I'm excited to dive into Read Only Memories: NEURODIVER, a game that's got everyone talking. From sci-fi romps to underwhelming experiences, opinions are all over the place! So, let's get this party started and see what all the fuss is about.

As I booted up the game, I was immediately struck by its gorgeous design. The futuristic world is a real treat for the eyes, with vibrant colors and intricate details that make you want to explore every nook and cranny. And explore you will! With a story that's full of twists and turns, you'll be hooked from start to finish.

But what really sets NEURODIVER apart is its lovable characters. ES88, the protagonist, is a blast to play as, with a personality that shines through even in the most mundane tasks. And then there are the supporting cast members - oh boy, they're a hoot! Each one has their own quirks and charm, making it hard not to get attached.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "But what about the gameplay?" Ah, my friends, that's where things get a little more complicated. The concept is strong, but execution can be hit-or-miss. Some puzzles feel too simplistic, while others are just plain frustrating. But hey, that's all part of the charm, right?

In conclusion, NEURODIVER is a wild ride that'll keep you entertained from start to finish. While it may not be perfect (what game is?), its strengths far outweigh its weaknesses. So grab some snacks, get comfy, and dive into this futuristic world - just don't forget to bring your A-game!
